extensionDescription.message: WaniKani Assistant will notify you when you have a new review available and display the number review items you have oustanding.

badgeTextNoAccessToken.message: Click to enter your WaniKani API Key.
badgeTextNoAccessToken.description: Badge text to display before a user has set their access token.

badgeTextStudyAvailable.message: You have $REVIEWS$ reviews and $LESSONS$ lessons. Click to launch your $LAUNCH$.
badgeTextStudyAvailable.description: Badge text to display when a user has reviews or lessons available.
